de.masters_of_disaster.ant.tasks.ar
クラス ArOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.FilterOutputStream
          de.masters_of_disaster.ant.tasks.ar.ArOutputStream
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
public class ArOutputStream
extends java.io.FilterOutputStream

The ArOutputStream writes an ar archive as an OutputStream. Methods are provided to put entries, and then write their contents by writing to this stream using write().

フィールドの概要
static int LONGFILE_BSD
          BSD ar variant is used to store long file names and file names with spaced in the archive.
static int LONGFILE_ERROR
          Fail if a long file name is required in the archive or the name contains spaces.
static int LONGFILE_GNU
          GNU ar variant is used to store long file names and file names with spaced in the archive.
static int LONGFILE_TRUNCATE
          Long paths will be truncated in the archive.

フィールドの詳細

LONGFILE_ERROR

public static final int LONGFILE_ERROR
Fail if a long file name is required in the archive or the name contains spaces.

関連項目:

LONGFILE_TRUNCATE

public static final int LONGFILE_TRUNCATE
Long paths will be truncated in the archive. Spaces are replaced by '_'

メソッドの詳細

setLongFileMode

public void setLongFileMode(int longFileMode)

putNextEntry

public void putNextEntry(ArEntry entry)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Put an entry on the output stream. This writes the entry's header record and positions the output stream for writing the contents of the entry. Once this method is called, the stream is ready for calls to write() to write the entry's contents. Once the contents are written, closeEntry() MUST be called to ensure that all buffered data is completely written to the output stream.

パラメータ:
entry - The ArEntry to be written to the archive.
例外:
java.io.IOException

closeEntry

public void closeEntry()
                throws java.io.IOException
Close an entry. This method MUST be called for all file entries that contain data. The reason is that we must pad an entries data if it is of odd size.

例外:
java.io.IOException

write

public void write(int b)
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes a byte to the current ar archive entry. This method simply calls write( byte[], int, int ).

オーバーライド:
クラス java.io.FilterOutputStream 内の write
パラメータ:
b - The byte to write to the archive.
例外:
java.io.IOException

write

public void write(byte[] wBuf)
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes bytes to the current ar archive entry. This method simply calls write( byte[], int, int ).

オーバーライド:
クラス java.io.FilterOutputStream 内の write
パラメータ:
wBuf - The buffer to write to the archive.
例外:
java.io.IOException

write

public void write(byte[] wBuf,
                  int wOffset,
                  int numToWrite)
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes bytes to the current ar archive entry. This method is aware of the current entry and will throw an exception if you attempt to write bytes past the length specified for the current entry.

オーバーライド:
クラス java.io.FilterOutputStream 内の write
パラメータ:
wBuf - The buffer to write to the archive.
wOffset - The offset in the buffer from which to get bytes.
numToWrite - The number of bytes to write.
例外:
java.io.IOException
